phrs.translation: 把（二者）加以比较；指出…之间的相似处

sentences.sentence: There are no analogies with any previous legal cases.
sentences.translation: 以往的法律案件没有哪一宗可与此案类比。

sentences.sentence: IQ tests ask you to complete verbal and visual analogies, to envision paper after it has been folded and cut, and to deduce numerical sequences, among other similar tasks.
sentences.translation: 智商测试要求你完成语言和视觉上的类比，想象纸张折叠和剪切之后的样子，推断数字序列，以及其他类似的任务。
